public value class SqlDecimal : IComparable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable, System::Xml::Serialization::IXmlSerializable

summary.span: 表示具有固定精度和小数位数的数值，该数值介于 - 10^38 +1 和 10^38 - 1 之间。

span.span: Represents a numeric value between - 10^38 +1 and 10^38 - 1, with fixed precision and scale.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已从其相应的.NET Framework 的不同基础数据结构数据类型。 has different underlying data structures from its corresponding .NET Framework data type. 有没有精度的概念。 has no concept of precision. 它使用 3 个字节来存储实际数据，并因此具有最大小数位数为 28。It uses 3 bytes to store the actual data, and therefore has a maximum scale of 28. 数据范围是-79228162514264337593543950335 到 79228162514264337593543950335。The data range is -79,228,162,514,264,337,593,543,950,335 through 79,228,162,514,264,337,593,543,950,335. 具有精度和小数位数。 has both precision and scale. 它使用 4 4 字节无符号的整数来存储实际数据，并因此具有最大精度和小数位数为 38。It uses 4 unsigned 4-byte integers to store the actual data, and therefore has maximum precision and scale of 38. 数据范围为-10 ^38 + 1 到 10 ^38-1。The data range is - 10^38 +1 through 10^38 - 1.
